When is Tennessee's drag ban set to go into effect?
April 1 this year
What does Tennessee's new law ban?
Male or female impersonators who provide entertainment that appeals to a prurient interest from performing in public spaces or in front of minors
What did Gov. Bill Lee sign into law on the same day as the drag ban?
SB 1
What does SB 1 restrict?
Access to gender-affirming care for transgender youth
How many states have introduced bills targeting drag performances?
15 states
Which organization noted that the drag ban violates First Amendment protections?
ACLU
When will the ban on gender-affirming care go into effect?
July 1
Until when can transgender youth already receiving medical care continue to receive it?
March 31, 2024
Which two organizations promised legal action against Tennessee for the healthcare ban?
ACLU and Lambda Legal
Which two states had similar healthcare restrictions blocked by federal courts?
Alabama and Arkansas
